meanings.definition: A device used for measuring the area of a closed curve on a plane surface.
meanings.sent1: The planimeters helped the students calculate the size of the shape accurately.
meanings.sent2: The engineer used planimeters to determine the area of the blueprint.
meanings.sent3: During the math class, the planimeters decided to have a race to see who could measure the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The planimeters were like detectives, uncovering the hidden area of the mysterious shape.
meanings.sent5: With planimeters in hand, the students explored the world of geometry with precision.
